# Government Tender Announcement

### Title and Reference
**Project Title**: SAS-01 Chiller Replacement Project
**Reference Number**: cb-765-49297755

### Tender Information
**Solicitation Number**: 23-58107
**Amendment Number**: 7
**Tender Closing Date**: November 7th, 2023, 15:00 (local time)

### Project Overview
The National Research Council Canada (NRC) is seeking proposals for the replacement of the chiller equipment at the SAS-01 building, located on the University of Saskatchewan campus in Saskatoon, SK.

### Tender Requirements
*  Bidders are required to obtain and review the Tender documents from the Buyandsell.gc.ca AGAO services provider.
*  The mandatory Site Visit is scheduled for October 18th and 19th, 2023, at 10:00. Bidders must send at least one representative to attend the site visit.
*  To be considered responsive, bidders must sign the Mandatory Site Visit Attendance Form provided by the Contracting Authority.

### Evaluation Criteria
The selection of the successful bidder will be based on the Lowest Price (LIP) criterion.

### Security Requirements
*  All bidders must be security screened to a valid RELIABILITY status level, as defined in the Government of Canada's Security Policy.
*  Bidders must provide a valid WORKSAFE Saskatchewan certificate with their Tender or prior to contract award.
